title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"
More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server
More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate
More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy
More info: Deployment

title: 测试文章
content:
<!DOCTYPE html><html>	<head>		<title>Hello World! </title>		<style>			body {				background: #888;			}		</style>		<script>			function refresh() {				window.location.replace(window.location.href)			}		</script>	</head>	<body>		<h1>Hello World! </h1>		<button onclick="refresh()" style="background-color: #BBB; border: none; ">Refresh</button>	</body></html>
Title 1Title 2This is a sentence. This is a sentence. This is a sentence.  This is a sentence. This is a link. This  is an image.  

No zuo no die. 

Why you try? 



test
